items.title: Resource type
items.help_text: This element defines the type of external resource being documented. This element plays an important role in the cataloguing system (NADA), as it is used to determine where and how the resource will be published. Particular attention must be paid to the type “Microdata File” (dat/micro) and to other data types, when the datasets will be published in a data catalog but with access restrictions). The resource type should be selected from the controlled vocabulary.

items.title: Author
items.help_text: The author(s) of the resource. If more than one, separate the names with a “;”.

items.title: Date
items.help_text: The date the resource was produced or released, preferably entered in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM or YYYY).

items.title: Country

enum.label: East Asia and the Pacific (IFC classification)
IBRD countries classified as high income
IDA countries classified as Fragile Situations
IDA countries classified as fragile situations, excluding Sub-Saharan Africa
IDA countries in Sub-Saharan Africa classified as fragile situations
IDA countries in Sub-Saharan Africa not classified as fragile situations
IDA countries not classified as Fragile Situations
IDA countries not classified as fragile situations, excluding Sub-Saharan Africa
Latin America & the Caribbean (IDA & IBRD countries)
Latin America and the Caribbean (IFC classification)
Middle East & North Africa (excluding high income)
Middle East & North Africa (IDA & IBRD countries)
Middle East and North Africa (IFC classification)
Sub-Saharan Africa excluding South Africa and Nigeria

items.help_text: The country name, if the resource is specific to a country. If more than one, enter the country names separated with a “;”.

items.title: Language
items.help_text: The language name. If more than one, enter the language names separated with a “;”.

items.title: Contributor
items.help_text: A list of contributor (free text). If more than one, enter the names separated with a “;”.

items.title: Publisher
items.help_text: List of contributor (free text). If more than one, enter the names separated with a “;”.

items.title: Rights
items.help_text: The rights associated with the resource.

items.title: Description
items.help_text: A brief description of the resource (but not the abstract, which should be entered in "Abstract").

items.title: Table of content
items.help_text: The table of content of the resource (if the resource is a publication), entered as free text.

items.title: File name or URL
items.help_text: A file name or a link to the resource (URL).
